con:soapui-project.name: OWSGTL
con:soapui-project.con:description: This Testproject is used for testing the OWSGTL.

con:testSuite.name: TestSetup
con:testSuite.con:description: Request and parse the capabilities of the service and configure test cases. Requires the etf-sui-owsgtl test library.

con:testCase.name: Endpoint is available
con:testCase.con:description: Check if the service is available.

con:property.con:name: capabilities
con:property.con:value: <WFS_Capabilities version="2.0.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.opengis.net/wfs/2.0 http://schemas.opengis.net/wfs/2.0/wfs.xsd" xmlns="http://www.opengis.net/wfs/2.0"
